page.title: 01THE MIDHURST AREA
page.content: Midhurst is a small country town in an area of great natural beauty which local authorities and population try hard to preserve.Unspoilt by heavy industry or military installations,it is a thriving,comparatively affluent area.The mild climate attracts elderly people to live here after retirement.The Health Centre and Community Centre are the envy of many larger towns.There are many clubs and societies catering for people with special interests like amateur music and drama.For professional entertainment we must go to nearby towns like Chichester.Midhurst has state schools for children from surrounding villages after the age of 1O.The old buildings,spread through the town,and polo matches played in and near Midhurst attract many visitors from home and abroad.
